headline: KLA Stock, Quanta Form This Chart Pattern, Giving The Green Light To Buy
summary: A handful of IBD 50 names have recently formed bullish chart patterns offering fresh buy points, with most after breaking out of proper bases.  Especially notable are Quanta Services, KLA and Comfort Systems USA.  KLA stock is in a base buy zone, while Quanta and Comfort Systems recently got the OK to buy from alternate entries.
